name: Oxyplants India Private Ltd.
overview:
Year of Establishment 2007. Oxyplants India Pvt. Ltd. formed and started manufacturing Oxygen, Nitrogen & Acetylene Plants.

Product Range: Owing to our advanced technology, updated expertise and experienced personnel, we are engaged in designing, manufacturing, erection and commissioning of various gas plants within the stipulated time.

Our Infrastructure: We possess and own a state of the art infrastructure facilities consisting of manufacturing units, , R&D and testing laboratory, warehousing etc.

Our Quality: We are an ISO 9001 : 2008 certified company, and our quality speaks for ourselves and being a quality conscious organization, we are committed to offer quality range of oxygen plants, acetylene plants, nitrogen plants and machines to our clients.

Why Us: Backed with our ethical business practices, timely delivery, east payment mode and competitive prices, we are able to achieve our goals of delivering the society with best of the cryogenic technology and application plants, and also making a good name in our client’s base with following characteristics.

Our Services: Oxygen/Nitrogen Gas Plant Oxygen Plant Machineries And Equipments Nitrogen Gas Plant Acetylene Gas Plant

offices.address1: 101, Kempanna Garden, Near 9th BTS Bus depot, 4th Phase, Penya
